pr_title: Make cleanup script more orderly in its deletes.

timeline.message: Make cleanup script more orderly in its deletes.

timeline.bodyText: Commenting so that we don't forget about this.  We need to see how else this flag is used.  If it really is all about deleting tiller than it was a strange name :)
timeline.author: rjeberhard
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -20,21 +20,34 @@
 #                   given lease on a failure.
 #
 #   SHARED_CLUSTER  Set this to true if you want cleanup to delete tiller
+#                   TBD tiller delete is disabled
